humanoid_creature.name: Humanoid creature
humanoid_creature.description: A humanoid is something that has an appearance resembling a human being.

hybrid_animal.name: Hybrid animal
hybrid_animal.description: A hybrid animal is one with parentage of two separate species.

cyborg.name: Cyborg
cyborg.description: A cyborg is a being with both biological and artificial (e.g. mechanical or electronic) parts.

humanoid_creature.name: Criatura humanoide
humanoid_creature.description: Una criatura humanoide es un ser que tiene aspecto humano.

hybrid_animal.name: Animal híbrido
hybrid_animal.description: Un animal híbrido es el resultado de cruzar animales de diferentes especies.

cyborg.name: Cíborg
cyborg.description: Un cíborg es un ser formado por materia viva y partes mecánicas o electrónicas.
